TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CheckBoxRenderer extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供用于呈现具有或不具有可视样式的复选框控件的方法。

span.span: Provides methods used to render a check box control with or without visual styles.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供了一套`static`可以用于呈现复选框控件的方法。The class provides a set of `static` methods that can be used to render a check box control. 呈现控件是指绘制控件的用户界面。Rendering a control refers to drawing the user interface of a control. 若要绘制的复选框，使用之一方法。To draw a check box, use one of the methods. 这些方法提供了各种选项，如绘制文本或图像与该复选框。These methods provide a variety of options, such as drawing text or an image with the check box. 如果在操作系统中启用了可视样式和视觉样式应用到当前应用程序，将绘制具有当前的视觉样式的复选框。If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the current application, will draw the check box with the current visual style. 否则为将绘制具有经典的 Windows 样式的复选框。Otherwise, will draw the check box with the classic Windows style. 这很有用，如果您正在绘制的操作系统中的当前视觉样式设置应自动匹配的自定义控件。This is useful if you are drawing a custom control that should automatically match the current visual style setting of the operating system. 此类包装的功能设置为其中一个元素由公开类。This class wraps the functionality of a that is set to one of the elements exposed by the class. 有关详细信息，请参阅[以视觉样式呈现控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md)。For more information, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何编写使用的自定义控件方法来绘制响应鼠标单击的复选框。The following code example demonstrates how to write a custom control that uses the method to draw a check box that responds to mouse clicks. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.CheckBoxRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.CheckBoxRenderer/cpp/form1.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.CheckBoxRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.CheckBoxRenderer/CS/form1.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.CheckBoxRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.CheckBoxRenderer/VB/form1.vb#0)]

span.span: Draws a check box control.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void DrawCheckBox (System.Drawing.Graphics g, System.Drawing.Point glyphLocation, System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.CheckBoxState state);

.method public static hidebysig void DrawCheckBox(class System.Drawing.Graphics g, valuetype System.Drawing.Point glyphLocation, valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.CheckBoxState state) cil managed
Public Shared Sub DrawCheckBox (g As Graphics, glyphLocation As Point, state As CheckBoxState)
public: static void DrawCheckBox(System::Drawing::Graphics ^ g, System::Drawing::Point glyphLocation, System::Windows::Forms::VisualStyles::CheckBoxState state);

param.name: g
param.span: 用于绘制复选框的 。

span.span: The used to draw the check box.

param.name: glyphLocation
param.span: 用于绘制复选框标志符号的 。

span.span: The to draw the check box glyph at.

param.name: state
param.span: 值之一，它指定复选框的可视状态。

summary.span: 在指定状态和位置绘制复选框控件。

span.span: Draws a check box control in the specified state and location.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在操作系统中启用了可视样式和视觉样式应用到当前应用程序，此方法将绘制具有当前的视觉样式的复选框。If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the current application, this method will draw the check box with the current visual style. 否则，它将绘制具有经典的 Windows 样式的复选框。Otherwise, it will draw the check box with the classic Windows style.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在操作系统中启用了可视样式和视觉样式应用到当前应用程序，此方法将绘制具有当前的视觉样式的复选框。If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the current application, this method will draw the check box with the current visual style. 否则，它将绘制具有经典的 Windows 样式的复选框。Otherwise, it will draw the check box with the classic Windows style. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用中自定义控件的方法方法，以便绘制在鼠标指针的位置确定的状态的复选框。The following code example uses the method in a custom control's method to draw a check box in the state determined by the location of the mouse pointer. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 由操作系统的当前视觉样式确定复选框标志符号的大小。The size of the check box glyph is determined by the current visual style of the operating system. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法来确定复选框文本的边界。The following code example uses the method to determine the bounds of the check box text. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. MemberSignature.Value: public static bool RenderMatchingApplicationState { get; set; }
.property bool RenderMatchingApplicationState
Public Shared Property RenderMatchingApplicationState As Boolean
public: static property bool RenderMatchingApplicationState { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示呈现器是否使用应用程序状态来确定呈现样式。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the renderer uses the application state to determine rendering style.

value.span: 如果使用应用程序状态确定呈现样式，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the application state is used to determine rendering style; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性是`true`、使用从设置属性来确定呈现样式。If the property is `true`, the uses the setting from the property to determine the rendering style. 如果是`false`，呈现器将始终使用视觉样式来呈现。If is `false`, the renderer will always render using visual styles.
